privacy and information 61 in order to continually innovate and improve the sdk google may collect certain usage statistics from the software including but not limited to a unique identifier associated ip address version number of the software and information on which tools and or services in the sdk are being used and how they are being used
before any of this information is collected the sdk will notify you and seek your consent
if you withhold consent the information will not be collected
62 the data collected is examined in the aggregate to improve the sdk and is maintained in accordance with googles privacy policy
